abstract: Asia Society and the Aspen Institute are sponsoring a trip to Beijing for 14 notable artists, including Meryl Streep, Yo-Yo Ma and Amy Tan.
snippet: Asia Society and the Aspen Institute are sponsoring a trip to Beijing for 14 notable artists, including Meryl Streep, Yo-Yo Ma and Amy Tan, for discussions and performances beginning Nov. 14.
lead_paragraph: Asia Society and the Aspen Institute are sponsoring a trip to Beijing for 14 notable artists, including Meryl Streep, Yo-Yo Ma and Amy Tan, for discussions and performances beginning Nov. 14.

headline.main: American Cultural Group to Visit China
headline.print_headline: American Cultural Group to Visit China
headline.seo: Group of American Cultural Figures to Visit China
